p: Verrucomicrobiota increased in read proportion with increasing DCl (I = 12%, III = 14%, V = 17% of all reads), and exceeded both Actinobacteriota and Acidobacteriota in DCl V. Methylacidiphilales ASVs represented the majority of Verrucomicrobiota reads (10% of all reads, 25 ASVs) and were differential in abundance among DCls ( Figure 2).
